head.title: Switzerland Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Switzerland Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Switzerland Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/switzerland/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Spending to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Switzerland Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Sweden Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Sweden Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Sweden Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/sweden/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

var DEBUG = false;if (window.location.host.indexOf('localhost') > -1) DEBUG = true;else if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') > -1) DEBUG = true;if (!DEBUG) {if (!window.console) window.console = {};var methods = ["log", "debug", "info"];for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++) {console[methods[i]] = function () { };}}

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Spending to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Sweden Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Norway Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Norway Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Norway Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/norway/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

var DEBUG = false;if (window.location.host.indexOf('localhost') > -1) DEBUG = true;else if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') > -1) DEBUG = true;if (!DEBUG) {if (!window.console) window.console = {};var methods = ["log", "debug", "info"];for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++) {console[methods[i]] = function () { };}}

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Spending to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Norway Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Denmark Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Denmark Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Denmark Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/denmark/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Spending to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Denmark Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Venezuela Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Venezuela Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Venezuela Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/venezuela/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

var DEBUG = false;if (window.location.host.indexOf('localhost') > -1) DEBUG = true;else if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') > -1) DEBUG = true;if (!DEBUG) {if (!window.console) window.console = {};var methods = ["log", "debug", "info"];for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++) {console[methods[i]] = function () { };}}

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Venezuela Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Uruguay Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Uruguay Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Uruguay Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/uruguay/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

var DEBUG = false;if (window.location.host.indexOf('localhost') > -1) DEBUG = true;else if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') > -1) DEBUG = true;if (!DEBUG) {if (!window.console) window.console = {};var methods = ["log", "debug", "info"];for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++) {console[methods[i]] = function () { };}}

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Uruguay Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Paraguay Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Paraguay Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Paraguay Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/paraguay/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

var DEBUG = false;if (window.location.host.indexOf('localhost') > -1) DEBUG = true;else if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') > -1) DEBUG = true;if (!DEBUG) {if (!window.console) window.console = {};var methods = ["log", "debug", "info"];for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++) {console[methods[i]] = function () { };}}

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Paraguay Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Colombia Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Colombia Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Colombia Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

head.script: var TESymbol = ''; var TECountry = ''; var TECategory = ''; var TEFrequency = ''; var TELanguage = ''; var TELastUpdate = ''; var TEChartVersion = ''; var symbol = ''; var symbolType = ''; var hasCalendar = false; var isLoggedIn = false; var TEAlertsName = ''; var TEChartsDatasource = ''; var IsMobile = false; var TEChartsMeta = ''; var TEForecast = []; var TEAuthorization = ''; var TESecurify = ''; var TESecurifyUrl = ''; var TEType = ''; var TEChartUrl = '/colombia/forecast'; var TEComparable = 0; var isAlertsLoaded = false; var IsDarkMode = false;

var DEBUG = false;if (window.location.host.indexOf('localhost') > -1) DEBUG = true;else if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') > -1) DEBUG = true;if (!DEBUG) {if (!window.console) window.console = {};var methods = ["log", "debug", "info"];for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++) {console[methods[i]] = function () { };}}

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Households Debt To GDP (% of GDP)

div.h2: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Colombia Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

div.div: Trading Economics welcomes candidates from around the world. Current job openings:

div.span:
Copyright 2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved
